title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 367.15 - Official notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 367.15 - Official notice

State Regulations

Official notice may be taken of all facts of which judicial
notice could be taken and of other facts within the specialized knowledge of
the department. When official notice is taken of a material fact not appearing
in the evidence in the record and of which judicial notice could not be taken, every party shall be given notice thereof and shall on timely request be
afforded an opportunity prior to decision to dispute the fact or its
materiality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1

367.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
